q1.question: What rewards could I receive?
q1.answer:
Early Seekers can receive two types of rewards:

Starter Pack: Contains premium currency and essential resources (Z-Credits, Orbs, Relic Fragments, Object Sand Essence).

Special Egg: A rare and exclusive Egg with a high evolve success rate to the Guardian.

q2.question: Where can I find them?
q2.answer: Your rewards will be automatically available in your Telegram account when the game launches. Simply open the bot and you'll have access to them.

q3.question: When will they be available?
q3.answer: Your rewards will be available after the game launches on October 17, 2025. You'll receive a notification via Telegram when you can use them.

q4.question: What do I need to do to use them?
q4.answer: After launch, open your in-game inventory within the Zodiark bot and you'll find your rewards ready to use immediately.
